title: The Dead Beat
author: Johnstone, Doug
snippet: Ian Lamb was brought up in Edinburgh by his widowed mother where he was a bright and popular pupil at Sciennes Primary School then at Boroughmuir High School. He claimed it was his mother's proudest moment when he received an unconditional acceptance to study at Edinburgh University.

title: Tombstoning
author: Johnstone, Doug
snippet: 'Hardly that surprising unless you spend your time loitering outside Sciennes Primary School, or my work. I scarcely get anywhere else these days.'
